Heavy Assault infantry carry anti-vehicle rocket launchers, light machineguns, and have an improved nanite shield for absorbing damage.

The Hades VSH4 anti-armor launcher can lock onto ground vehicles and deliver a heavy burst of damage, and retains its dumbfire capability for close range situations. VS use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Optional Lockon: Armor</font>

Welcome back, soldier! Take #count([*cert_points*]) on us so you can continue the fight for freedom!

A compensator redirects gases upward, reducing vertical recoil. The increased sound pressure will cause the player to show on the minimap from farther away, and increased weapon bulk reduces accuracy when firing from the hip.

USE
Claim rewards from Coordinator Tolland on Sanctuary.

DESCRIPTION
Requires Expedition Asset crafting permissions.

Charter an expedition to gather 7 Polystellarite for your Outfit Armory.

Only ONE resource expedition may be active at a time.

Synchronizes your framerate to your monitor's refresh rate. Enable this if you see tearing while in game. (Default: Off)

When activated, the vehicle is encased in a coating that allows it to slip through enemy gate shields and avoid damage caused by collisions with other vehicles. Lasts 15 seconds. Can be activated once every 50 seconds.

With reclaimed vehicles resting safely in the hands of Nanite Systems' researchers, the focus shifts to data readings more relevant to the current threats on Esamir. Using old technology to discover new information, Representative Foster asks for the operative's assistance in releasing a Weather Drone within the looming Electrical Storm that patrols the battlescape.

Directive Score is an account-wide statistic that increases as Directives are completed. This score represents the player's willingness to conquer new challenges, and devotion to exploring all aspects of the game.
